page.title: 04PEDESTRIANISATION
page.content: {LAYOUT OF CENTRE OF DUMFRIES Dumfries is a typical market,town with a typical market town layout.The main shopping area of the town is the large High Street in the centre of town which contains a lot of major chain department stores such as Marks & Spencers,Presto's,Boots, etc. There are several car parks placed just around the major shopping area allowing customers to visit the major stores without having to walk too far. Visiting these shops are thousands of customers crossing the High Street many times a day while all the time there is a constant flow of traffic travelling up and down.It is because of all these vehicles and the huge number of shoppers;it has now been proposed to pedestrianise the High Street.
